alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:52PM CDT until July 20 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Giles County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pulaski, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pulaski, Ardmore, Elkton, Goodspring, Frankewing and Prospect. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
